_header: Leo the pope findeth by writing
_description:
Eight lines translating the Latin (11 lines): ‘Leo papa Nichil est
validus’, etc.

Lam390.Transcription:
Leon þe pope fyndyth by wrytyngOf þre yeftys þat beth
                    in specyallBy þe wych euery syn in man regnyngHys ouercome &
                    put into a fallÞe fyrst his expressyd by nameBeing to leve to god
                    his plesabyllþe secvnd largyte þat cavsyth good fameÞe
                    thryd cheryte to god hys comendabyll
Lam390.Editions:
James,  Montague Rhodes,  and  Claude Jenkins.  
             A Descriptive Catalogue of the Manuscripts in the Library of Lambeth
                Palace.
         2 vols. Cambridge, 1930-32: 538.
